title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3 points are earned for correctly expressing the area as a definite integral

A= ∫ 0 2/k (4−(k y 2 +2))dy or A= 1 k ∫ 2 4 x−2 dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@553D@

<-1> error in limits

<-1> considers twice the region

<-2> error in integrand

1 point is earned for correctly showing that A decreases using algebra, geometry, or calculus

A= 4 2 3 k −0.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4169@

dA dk =− 2 2 3 k −1.5 <0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46EF@ for all k > 0

thus the area decreases as k increases
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

A= 4 2 3 k −0.5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4169@

dA dk =− 2 2 3 k −1.5 <0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46EF@ for all k > 0

thus the area decreases as k increases
